data.title: Contributions to the tribute of Joseph Franklin Smith
data.meta_description: Contributions to the tribute of Joseph Franklin Smith.
data.text:
P

Pam Thompson posted a condolence

Rita and Girls, We were so sorry to hear about your Husband and Dad. It doesn't seem long ago that the girls were playing in the back yard with my Kelly. Our prayers and thoughts are with you all. Pam and Lee

D

//s3.amazonaws.com/skins.funeraltechweb.com/tribute-gestures/Candle.png

Andy, we were so shocked and saddened to hear the news of your dad, Joe's, sudden passing. Please know our family will keep you and Anna, your mom Rita, your sisters and their families and the entire Smith family close in our thoughts and prayers. May you all find peace and solace through the loving embrace and support of family and friends and in his memories, that will now stay forever in your hearts. xo

A

Aaron LaRue posted a condolence

We'd like to extend our deapest sympathy to Joe's family from all the members of our staff at LaRue-Carey Insurance, Group. You are in our thoughts and prayers.

M

Myron & Margo Shapiro posted a condolence

We are very saddened to hear of the sudden death of Joe. Our hearts go out to your family during this very difficult time and may our prayers help ease the pain of your loss. Cherish the memories and celebrate Joe's life. With deepest sympathy and in prayer, Myron & Margo Shapiro

W

Wanda Huffman Dixon posted a condolence

Katie,I am so sorry for your family's loss. You are in my thoughts and prayers. May our Good LORD give you peace, comfort, and strength in the days to come. GOD BLESS all of you.

E

Ellie and Pete Shears posted a condolence

To Rita and the Smith family: Our deepest sympathy as you work through Joe's sudden death. God's plan for us is sometimes hard to understand but his Grace and Love carry us through these difficult times. Our prayers and thoughts are with you. Pete and Ellie Shears
